title: Trojan Detection Container (ICSI) - currently no metaparameter included
technique_description: Extracting statistics from parameters and eigen values for each model and perform data augmentation for vit and mobilenet model features; Training the features on the tuned Gradient Boosting Classifiers.
technique_changes: Restructure the code, mainly for specifiying configuration mode

augment_train_data.description: For reconfiguration mode, whether to augment the training data with the training dataset or not

automatic_training.description: For reconfiguration mode, whether to auto-tune the classifiers or not
